```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

lobster_data <- read_csv(("lobster_abundance_sbc_lter.csv"),
                         na = "-99999") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  uncount(count)

lobster_count <- lobster_data %>% 
  count(site,year)

lobster_size_2012 <- lobster_data %>% 
  filter(year == 2012)

lobster_size_2018 <- lobster_data %>% 
  filter(year == 2018)
```


#Results B

```{r}
ggplot(data = lobster_size_2012, aes(x = size_mm)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~site)
  
ggplot(data = lobster_size_2018, aes(x = size_mm)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~site)
```

# compare means between MPA site and non MPA sites

```{r}
lobster_mpa_2012 <- lobster_data %>%
  filter(site == c("IVEE", "NAPL")) %>% 
  filter(year == "2012", "2018")
  
lobster_not_mpa_2012 <- lobster_data %>% 
  filter(site == c("CARP", "MOHK", "AQUE")) %>% 
  filter(year == "2012")

lobster_mpa_2018 <- lobster_data %>%
  filter(site == c("IVEE", "NAPL")) %>% 
  filter(year == "2018")
  
lobster_not_mpa_2018 <- lobster_data %>% 
  filter(site == c("CARP", "MOHK", "AQUE")) %>% 
  filter(year == "2018")

```

```{r}

lobster_summary_mpa_2012 <- lobster_mpa_2012 %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_size = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_size = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sample_n = n()
  )

lobster_summary_not_mpa_2012 <- lobster_not_mpa_2012 %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_size = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_size = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sample_n = n()
  )

lobster_summary_mpa_2018 <- lobster_mpa_2018 %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_size = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_size = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sample_n = n()
  )

lobster_summary_not_mpa_2018 <- lobster_not_mpa_2018 %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_size = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_size = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
    sample_n = n()
  )
```
